name: Abstacle
description:
This game is relatively simple. It is basically an extension of the hurdle rules of real sports competitions. You always sprint forward at the fastest speed, and you need to constantly leap over obstacles!

Game features

In the game, the player will become an athlete, who can jump over the barrier and sprint forward successfully by hitting the space at the right time. Quick eyes and quick hands, seize the right moment and try to run forward.
